分享html5新特性 contenteditable

22 October 2012

最近做个项目碰到一个很纠结的问题，富文本编辑。什么脑筋都动了，抓js句柄，手动解析标签属性，然后转成ios的font等等，想都不用想这种愚蠢又耗时的行为是不可能解决问题的。直到大stackoverflow救了我
原帖如下
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8012245/using-ios-5-rich-text-editor
用到的最重要的新特性 就是 contenteditable
具体demo 如下
http://html5demos.com/contenteditable

简单来说就是加个section 设置个 contenteditable，就那么简单！
比如

 hi 我来作试验的 
  首先是段落 
  &nbsp; &nbsp; 然后是缩进  

 然后多换行  
 然后大段文字ahdjasd  

jaieowajkncnxmbfhawija
 hiiii   

 &nbsp; &nbsp; test over 





----------------------------------我是分割线-------------------------

 hi 我来作试验的 
  首先是段落 
  &nbsp; &nbsp; 然后是缩进  

 然后多换行  
 然后大段文字ahdjasd  

jaieowajkncnxmbfhawija
 hiiii   

 &nbsp; &nbsp; test over 


仅仅只要把需要编辑的部分加个section设置个 contenteditable＝true，所有的富文本编辑问题就这么搞定了……
>

一个非常简易的随机选的小程序

16 October 2012

写了一段小程序，随机产生一个列表中的名字，可用于摇奖，或者什么的。

需要安装python 的Tkinter图形库

 

<pre lang="python" file="rp.py" colla="+">

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
from Tkinter import *
import sys
import time
import codecs
from time import sleep
llist=['xxx','xxy','xyy','yyy','yxx','zzz','zxx']
flag=0

# position of buttons
row_button = 8
col_button = 5

# font size
size_title = 20
size_button = 12
size_text = 14

# the length of name_list
Len_List = 5

# delay time
Delay_Time = 10
delay_stop = 0
stop_times = 10

# Label width
label_width = 20
class rp( Frame ):
    def __init__(self):
        Frame.__init__(self)
        self.pack( expand = YES, fill = BOTH)
        self.master.title("RP")
        self.god = PhotoImage(file = "01.gif")
        self.label_1 = Label(self, image = self.god, font = ("新宋体", size_title))
        self.label_2 = Label(self, text = "", font = ("新宋体", size_title-4))
        self.label_1.grid(row = 0, column = 0)
        self.label_2.grid(row = 1, column = 0)

        self.button_start = Button(self, text = "Start", font = ("Comic Sans MS", size_button), command = self.start)
        self.button_stop = Button(self, text = "Stop", font = ("Comic Sans MS", size_button), command = self.stop)
        self.button_quit = Button(self, text = "Exit", font = ("Comic Sans MS", size_button), command = self.quit)

        self.button_start.grid(row = row_button, column = col_button)
        self.button_stop.grid(row = row_button, column = col_button+1)
        self.button_quit.grid(row = row_button,column = col_button+2)

        self.name_list = [None] * Len_List
        self.label_list = [None] * Len_List

        for i in range(Len_List):
            global flag
            self.name_list[i] = llist[i]
            flag=(flag+1)%llist.__len__()
        for i in range(Len_List):
            if i == 2:
                self.label_list[i] = Label(self, text = self.name_list[i], font = ("新宋体", 30), background = ("white"), foreground = ("blue"), width = label_width)
                self.label_list[i].grid(row = 2+i, column = 2)
            else:
                self.label_list[i] = Label(self, text = self.name_list[i], font = ("新宋体", 30), width = label_width)
                self.label_list[i].grid(row = 2+i, column = 2)
    def _scroll_text(self):

        global Delay_Time
        global delay_stop
        global stop_times
        global flag
        global llist

        if stop_times == 0:
            if self.after_id:
                self.master.after_cancel(self.after_id)
                self.after_id = None
                return 0
        flag=(flag+1)%llist.__len__()
        self.line = llist[flag]

        self.name_list.pop(0)
        self.name_list.append(self.line)
        #sleep(0.2)
        for i in range(Len_List):
            #self.label_list[i].destroy()
            #print self.name_list[i]
            if i == 2:
                self.label_list[i]["text"]=self.name_list[i]
            else:
                self.label_list[i]["text"]=self.name_list[i]

        if delay_stop:
            Delay_Time += 10
            stop_times -= 1
            self.after_id = self.master.after(Delay_Time, self._scroll_text)
            if stop_times==0:
#                print self.label_list[2]["text"]
#                for i in llist:
#                    print i.decode('UTF-8')
                llist.remove(self.label_list[2]["text"].encode('utf-8'))
        else:
            self.after_id = self.master.after(Delay_Time, self._scroll_text)

    def start(self):
        global delay_stop
        global stop_times
        global Delay_Time
        delay_stop = 0
        stop_times = 10
        Delay_Time = 10
        self.after_id = self.master.after(Delay_Time, self._scroll_text)

    def stop(self):
        global delay_stop
        delay_stop = 1

    def quit(self):
        sys.exit(0)

app = rp()
app.mainloop()
&lt;/pre&gt;
>

关于os的一点小见

21 August 2012

最近同学有买了mac，一段试用后突然问我和windows的差别在哪儿，有一点不知道怎么回答，也不禁对自己所认识的操作系统一通反思，最后我回答了mac好就好在他算是unix＋无敌的ui，虽然片面但我觉得这就是mac最好的地方了，看过一篇文章，感觉比喻的非常好，windows就像是表面光鲜整齐的大树，而实质上他的根须错乱(n个dll往系统里丢注册表什么给改的一塌糊涂等)而unix就感觉是一块块的存在需要什么就拿什么如积木一般，或许这就是他令人喜欢的理由吧。突然想写这点什么的契机也是因为发现ml把以前一些的如gcc  make svn 什么的也放进了xcode的沙盒中了，这个改动或许就是更为了他的积木这个思想的吧。

 

ps.升到ml后发现好多常用东西没了的朋友把 /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/usr/bin 加到PATH里就ok了

分享一个很好用的python的web框架

05 July 2012

tornado使用的是非阻塞io epoll和kqueue性能上就不会差，并且感觉非常好用，完暴django感觉，主要封装了有oauth websocket 和一些其他常用框架

项目地址 https://github.com/facebook/tornado

中文官方文档 http://sebug.net/paper/books/tornado/#tornado-walkthrough

注：并不完全兼容python3 需要手动改源码

``` 无意间看到一个第20届国际C语言混乱代码大赛（IOCCC）的最佳作品，同样作为死宅对他的作品也更加是喜欢了，于是乎我就来分享下这段代码。

这是一段典型的自功自受啊，把自己当成输入，成为输出后再继续当输入= = 源文件

再迭代下去就阿卡林就变型的完全看不出了。。 akari源码地址：http://www.ioccc.org/2011/akari/akari.c

开源库AsyncSocket实现socket通信的基本用法

18 March 2012

AsyncSocket.h AsyncSocket.m

```

  • (BOOL)connectToHost:(NSString*)hostname onPort:(UInt16)port error:(NSError **)errPtr //connect to the server

  • (void)writeData:(NSData *)data withTimeout:(NSTimeInterval)timeout tag:(long)tag //send data

  • (void)onSocket:(AsyncSocket *)sock didReadData:(NSData *)data withTag:(long)tag //be called when the data was received

  • (void)onSocketDidDisconnect:(AsyncSocket *)sock //be called when the socket disconnect

  • (void)onSocketDidSecure:(AsyncSocket *)sock // be called when TLS is unstable

Example client

AsyncSocket *client; NSSError *err=nil; NSString *hel=@"hello AsyncSocket!"; NSData *data = [hel dataUsingEncoding:NSISOLatin1StringEncoding]; [client connectToHost:@"127.0.0.1" onPort:51423 error:&err]; [client writeData:data withTimeout:-1 tag:0]; - (void)onSocket:(AsyncSocket *)sock didReadData:(NSData *)data withTag:(long)tag{ 

NSString* aStr = [[NSString alloc] initWithData:data encoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding];  
NSLog(@"Hava received datas is :%@",aStr);  
[aStr release];  
[client readDataWithTimeout:-1 tag:0];

}

Example server

import socket host='' port=51423 s=socket.socket(socket.AF_INET,socket.SOCK_STREAM) s.setsockopt(socket.SOL_SOCKET,socket.SO_REUSEADDR,1) s.bind((host,port)) s.listen(1)

print "server is running on port %d;press ctrl-c to terminate" while 1: try: clientsock, clientaddr = s.accept() except KeyboardInterrupt: raise except: traceback.print_exc() continue try: print "Got connection from", clientsock.getpeername() while 1: data = clientsock.recv(4096) if not len(data): break clientsock.sendall(data) except (KeyboardInterrupt, SystemExit): raise except: traceback.print_exc() try: clientsock.close() except KeyboardInterrupt: raise except: traceback.print_exc()

分享一个webview和js交互的封装

14 March 2012

marcuswestin / WebViewJavascriptBridge 1) Copy Classes/WebViewJavascriptBridge.h and Classes/WebViewJavascriptBridge.m into your Xcode project

2) Instantiate a UIWebView, a WebViewJavascriptBridge, and set yourself as the bridge's delegate

   #import 
#import "WebViewJavascriptBridge.h"

@interface ExampleAppDelegate : UIResponder 

@end

@implementation ExampleAppDelegate

- (BOOL)application:(UIApplication *)application didFinishLaunchingWithOptions:(NSDictionary *)launchOptions
{
    self.window = [[UIWindow alloc] initWithFrame:[[UIScreen mainScreen] bounds]];

    self.webView = [[UIWebView alloc] initWithFrame:self.window.bounds];
    [self.window addSubview:webView];
    self.javascriptBridge = [WebViewJavascriptBridge javascriptBridgeWithDelegate:self];
    self.webView.delegate = javascriptBridge;

    [self.window makeKeyAndVisible];
    return YES;
}

- (void)javascriptBridge:(WebViewJavascriptBridge *)bridge receivedMessage:(NSString *)message fromWebView:(UIWebView *)webView 
{
    NSLog(@"MyJavascriptBridgeDelegate received message: %@", message);
}

@end

3) Go ahead and send some messages from Objc to javascript


[self.javascriptBridge sendMessage:@"Well hello there" toWebView:self.webView];


4) Finally, set up the javascript side of things

document.addEventListener('WebViewJavascriptBridgeReady', function onBridgeReady() {
    WebViewJavascriptBridge.setMessageHandler(function(message) {
        alert('Received message: ' + message)
    })
    WebViewJavascriptBridge.sendMessage('Hello from the javascript')
}, false)

>
